What does this data set describe?

Title: Lim_Microrregiao
Abstract:
Este layer de limite regional foi criado pela Coordenação de Geoprocessamento do Instituto Jones dos Santos Neves, com o intuito de representar a microrregionalização de planejamento elaborada pela Secretaria de Estado de Planejamento do ES, com a finalidade de gerir, administrar e planejar melhor o território capixaba, conforme a lei 9.768 de 2011.
  1. How should this data set be cited?

    DTCAR/IDAF, Agosto de 2010, Lim_Microrregiao.

    Online Links:

    • www.geobases.es.gov.br

  2. What geographic area does the data set cover?

    West_Bounding_Coordinate: -41.889440
    East_Bounding_Coordinate: -39.662470
    North_Bounding_Coordinate: -17.878043
    South_Bounding_Coordinate: -21.313495

  3. What does it look like?

  4. Does the data set describe conditions during a particular time period?

    Calendar_Date: unknown
    Currentness_Reference: publication date

  5. What is the general form of this data set?

    Geospatial_Data_Presentation_Form: vector digital data

  6. How does the data set represent geographic features?

    1. How are geographic features stored in the data set?

      This is a Vector data set. It contains the following vector data types (SDTS terminology):

      • G-polygon (10)

    2. What coordinate system is used to represent geographic features?

      The map projection used is Transverse Mercator.

      Projection parameters:
      Scale_Factor_at_Central_Meridian: 0.999600
      Longitude_of_Central_Meridian: -39.000000
      Latitude_of_Projection_Origin: 0.000000
      False_Easting: 500000.000000
      False_Northing: 10000000.000000

      coordinates are encoded using coordinate pair
      Abscissae (x-coordinates) are specified to the nearest 0.000000
      Ordinates (y-coordinates) are specified to the nearest 0.000000
      coordinates are specified in meters

      The horizontal datum used is D_SIRGAS_2000.
      The ellipsoid used is Geodetic Reference System 80.
      The semi-major axis of the ellipsoid used is 6378137.000000.
      The flattening of the ellipsoid used is 1/298.257222.

  7. How does the data set describe geographic features?

    Lim_Microrregiao

    FID
    Internal feature number. (Source: ESRI)

    Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

    Shape
    Feature geometry. (Source: ESRI)

    Coordinates defining the features.

    NOME
    (Source: Nome oficial dos municípios)

    areaKm2

    FONTE

    DATA
    (Source: Mês e ano da conclusão do layer)

Who produced the data set?

  1. Who are the originators of the data set? (may include formal authors, digital compilers, and editors)

    • DTCAR/IDAF

  2. Who also contributed to the data set?

    Secretaria de Estado e Planejamento e Instituto Jones dos Sanots Neves

  3. To whom should users address questions about the data?

    Rodrigo Bergamaschi
    CGEO/IJSN

    27 36368088 (voice)
    rodrigo@ijsn.es.gov.br

    Hours_of_Service: 08:00-12:00; 13:30-17:30
    Contact_Instructions:
    Na ausência do Mário Sartori poderá ser contactado no mesmo telefone os profissionais Laérsio, Vailson Schneider ou Moura.

How can someone get a copy of the data set?

Are there legal restrictions on access or use of the data?

Access_Constraints: Não tem restrição para acesso deste layer.
Use_Constraints:
Não existe restrição de uso, porém, preferencialmente deverá ser usado com os outros shapes da mesma escala.
